title: Konjam Nilavu Chandhralekha Lyrics Thiruda Thiruda
stanzas:
<div>
Konjam Nilavu Chandhralekha Lyrics Thiruda Thiruda

Konjam nilavu
konjam neruppu
ondraai serthaal
endhan dhegam.

konjam nanju
konjam amudham
ondraaga serthaal
en kangal

konjam mirugam
konjam kadavul
ondraai serthaal
endhan nenjam..

Chandralekha aaahh...
Chandralekha aaahh...
Chandralekha aaahh...
Chandralekha aaahh...

Konjam nilavu
konjam neruppu
ondraaga serthaal
endhan dhegam.

en kanavil evano avan
en iravil oliyaai therivaan
vaan mazhaipol
neeril vizhuvaan.
thinam naan nirkkum
varaiyil pozhivaan

en idhazhai
ival thandhu maayaathu
ini paar kadalil
alai endrum oyaathu.

vandhu naan mannile
yaen pirandhen
endra kaelvi vaaraadhu.
ingu nee irundhaal
oru tholvi neraadhu.

mangai un kaal pattaal
mannum oru mannalla
vellai pon dhegathil
vaervai thuli uppalla

sendhaazham poovukku
mullondurm kurai alla.
mullondru vaithaalum
pon meedhu thiraialla

Konjam nilavu
konjam neruppu
ondraai serthaal
endhan dhegam.

konjam nanju
konjam amudham
ondraaga serthaal
en kangal

konjam mirugam
konjam kadavul
ondraai serthaal
endhan nenjam..

Chandralekha aaahh...
Chandralekha aaahh...
Chandralekha aaahh...
Chandralekha aaahh...

penne un kannaalam
pirai yaeri varuvaane
vinkonda meenellaam
vizhaiyaada tharuvaane.

Konjam nilavu
konjam neruppu
ondraai serthaal
endhan dhegam.

konjam nanju
konjam amudham
ondraaga serthaal
en kangal

konjam mirugam
konjam kadavul
ondraai serthaal
endhan nenjam..

Chandralekha aaahh...
Chandralekha aaahh...
Chandralekha aaahh...
Chandralekha aaahh...
